title: iPod Touch
overview: The iPod Touch revolutionizes mobile entertainment with its multi-touch interface, widescreen display, and Wi-Fi connectivity for music, video, and web browsing.
details: Features the same multi-touch screen technology as iPhone.
Pinch to zoom in on photos, scroll through songs and videos with a flick.
Cover Flow lets you browse your music collection visually.
Shop the iTunes Wi-Fi Music Store from anywhere with internet access.
Surf the web using Safari and stream YouTube videos with built-in Wi-Fi.

specifications.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, WAV, AIFF, Apple Lossless
specifications.Battery Life: Up to 22 hours for audio, 5 hours for video
